title: Bound
description: This is a previously-published edition - ISBN13: 9781947189386New York Times bestselling author Aleatha Romig brings you Bound, the dramatic conclusion to her brand-new dark romance set in the same dangerous underworld as Secrets. You do not need to read the Web of Sin trilogy to get caught in this highly acclaimed intriguing saga, Tangled Web. BOUND is book three of the TANGLED WEB trilogy.
author: Aleatha Romig
